entry.entryTitle: Is XML case sensitive? What should an XML document start with?
entry.paragraph:
XML is case sensitive, therefor you must keep this in mind when creating tags.
An XML document begins with an optional XML declaration, which identifies the document as an XML document. The version attribute specifies the version of XML syntax used in the document.

entry.entryTitle: What is a root element of an XML document?
entry.paragraph: The root element of an XML document encompasses all its other elements
